long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to your personal virtual makeup artist on your browser! Our new roboMUA chrome extension offers an entirely new and improved beauty experience for every eye, lip, body, and face. We’re excited to have built a space for you to find your shade, shop, and explore products from over 42 different makeup brands. Try the latest product releases or find your new favorite brands focusing on inclusivity and diversity.
 
Easily shop for your beauty needs, from makeup to skincare products. Find your foundation, setting powder, skin tint, eye palette, perfume, shapewear, nude shoes, and concealer among others with a button click.
 
You can also discover your new favorite makeup and skincare products with features like Virtual Try-on and Video tutorials. roboMUA uses computer vision, and recommender system AI models to help you find your shade so you can be properly matched to beauty products. 
 
roboMUA identifies the shade of the user through image uploads or live camera capture and recommends foundations, skin tints, concealers and other beauty needs from various makeup brands with YouTube tutorials, Instagram Augmented Reality (AR) filters, and direct links to recommended products.
 
The roboMUA mobile app has your beauty needs covered from head to toe. 
 
roboMUA Features:
SKINCARE
• Find the perfect skincare routine for your skin type
• Treat acne, dark spots, dryness & pores with our recommendation
• Shop from leading skincare brands and many more!

MAKEUP & COSMETICS
FOUNDATION: 
• Find your foundation in 40+ makeup brands
• Find your foundation with just a selfie 
• Get special access to the latest offers
• Book a beauty service appointment for hair, skin & more in a snap! 
 
SKIN TINT: 
• Find your skin tint in 40+ makeup brands
• Find your skin tint with just a selfie. 
• Get special access to the latest offers.
 
CONCEALER: 
• Find your concealer in 40+ makeup brands
• Find your concealer with just a selfie. 
• Get special access to the latest offers.
• Browse concealer, mini sizes & value sets to suit your beauty budget.
 
SETTING POWDER :
• Find your setting powder in 40+ makeup brands.
• Find your setting powder with just a selfie.
• Browse setting powder, mini sizes & value sets to suit your beauty budget.
• Get special access to the latest offers.

FRAGRANCE
• Buy all-time favorite fragrances or try a fresh new signature scent using Artificial Intelligence (AI).
• Get fragrance recommendations based on your preferences.
• Luxurious scents from Jean Paul Gaultier, Lancome, Yves Saint Laurent, and more.
 
 SHAPEWEAR
• Find your Shapewear with an image of your leg, arm or patch of skin.
• Get special access to the latest offers.
 
NUDE SHOES 
• Find your Nude Shoes with just an image of your leg, arm or patch of skin.
• Get special access to the latest offers.
 
VIRTUAL TRY-ON 
• Our virtual try-on would help you try on your makeup with our Augmented Reality (AR) filters.
 
VIDEO TUTORIALS
• Get a tailored video tutorial for your recommended product. 
 
 BUY
• Get a tailored product recommendation and purchase the products right from the brand website with a click.
